full_summary:
# Procurement of Repair Services for a Collins DME-4000 DME

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01010774
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-10T13:00:00
* **Solicitation Number:** T8493-22-0016

### Procurement Category

This procurement falls under the Category *SRVTGD*

### Description

Transport Canada requires the repair of a Collins DME-4000 DME by the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM). The Period of the Contract spans from the date of Contract award to December 31st, 2022, inclusive.

### Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria

This is an open bid solicitation process. The Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical Capacity
* Past Performance
* Compliance with Specifications

### How to Obtain the RFP and Questions

The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents, including the Invitation to Bid and the Technical Specifications, are available on the Province of Canada Bidders website:

* http://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/21/870a26db97b66a1fa03de42d4cd92d33/rfpe_t8493-22-0016.pdf (English)
* http://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/21/5c84be3078069dc393bc8fcbeada19b4/rfpf_t8493-22-0016.pdf (French)

Questions regarding the RFP should be submitted to:

Tanya Nadeau, Contracting Authority
Email: tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca
Phone: 343-575-6684

### Trade Agreements

It's not expected that the total value of this requirement will reach the thresholds of the trade agreements.

### Solicitation Team

For further information, please contact:

Tanya Nadeau, Contracting Authority
Phone: 343-575-6684
Email: tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca

or visit the Province of Canada Bidders website for the RFP and more information.
